attributes.action: We object to the introduction of local Goverment Inspectors to enter our homes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Do not procceed with the currant experiment in Northen Ireland which  will allow Local Goverment Inspectors to enter into our own Homes with a view to assessing its Council Tax value.
This is a direct infringement of our hard won Civil Liberties and will create nothing less then a Police State.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
